titleStmt.title: The curse of sacriledge Preached in a priuate parish church, the Sunday before Michaelmas last. To which are annexed some certaine quære's, which are pertinent to the vnmasking of our homebred church-robbers. D.E.B.
titleStmt.author: Brouncker, Edward.

titleStmt.title: The curse of sacriledge Preached in a priuate parish church, the Sunday before Michaelmas last. To which are annexed some certaine quære's, which are pertinent to the vnmasking of our homebred church-robbers. D.E.B.
titleStmt.author: Brouncker, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, printer to that famous Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: "A catalogue of such quæres as are submitted by the author in all due respect to the iudgment of the wisest sonnes of his mother the church" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
